mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.APPELLATION as appellation, a.LAST_NAME as lastName, a.MIDDLE_NAME as middleName, a.FIRST_NAME as firstName, a.SUFFIX as suffix, a.POSITION as position, a.BIRTHDAY as birthday, a.EMAIL as email, a.PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP as prcentageOfOwnership, a.NATIONALITY as nationality, a.BIRTH_COUNTRY as birthCountry, a.PERSONAL_TYPE as personalType, a.IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER as isBusinessManager, a.IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER as isAmericanTaxpayer, a.USER_NAME as userName, a.PASSWORD as password, a.ENTITY_NAME as entityName, a.COMPANY_POSITION as companyPosition, a.PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO as personalTypeTwo, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , APPELLATION , LAST_NAME , MIDDLE_NAME , FIRST_NAME , SUFFIX , POSITION , BIRTHDAY , EMAIL , PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP , NATIONALITY , BIRTH_COUNTRY , PERSONAL_TYPE , IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER , IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER , USER_NAME , PASSWORD , ENTITY_NAME , COMPANY_POSITION , PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{appellation} , #{lastName} , #{middleName} , #{firstName} , #{suffix} , #{position} , #{birthday} , #{email} , #{prcentageOfOwnership} , #{nationality} , #{birthCountry} , #{personalType} , #{isBusinessManager} , #{isAmericanTaxpayer} , #{userName} , #{password} , #{entityName} , #{companyPosition} , #{personalTypeTwo} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
APPELLATION ,
LAST_NAME ,
MIDDLE_NAME ,
FIRST_NAME ,
SUFFIX ,
POSITION ,
BIRTHDAY ,
EMAIL ,
PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP ,
NATIONALITY ,
BIRTH_COUNTRY ,
PERSONAL_TYPE ,
IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER ,
IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER ,
USER_NAME ,
PASSWORD ,
ENTITY_NAME ,
COMPANY_POSITION ,
PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE

#{accountId} ,
#{appellation} ,
#{lastName} ,
#{middleName} ,
#{firstName} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
APPELLATION = #{appellation} ,
LAST_NAME = #{lastName} ,
MIDDLE_NAME = #{middleName} ,
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} ,
SUFFIX = #{suffix} ,
POSITION = #{position} ,
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} ,
EMAIL = #{email} ,
PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP = #{prcentageOfOwnership} ,
NATIONALITY = #{nationality} ,
BIRTH_COUNTRY = #{birthCountry} ,
PERSONAL_TYPE = #{personalType} ,
IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER = #{isBusinessManager} ,
IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER = #{isAmericanTaxpayer} ,
USER_NAME = #{userName} ,
PASSWORD = #{password} ,
ENTITY_NAME = #{entityName} ,
COMPANY_POSITION = #{companyPosition} ,
PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO = #{personalTypeTwo} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , APPELLATION , LAST_NAME , MIDDLE_NAME , FIRST_NAME , SUFFIX , POSITION , BIRTHDAY , EMAIL , PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP , NATIONALITY , BIRTH_COUNTRY , PERSONAL_TYPE , IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER , IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER , USER_NAME , PASSWORD , ENTITY_NAME , COMPANY_POSITION , PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.appellation} , #{item.lastName} , #{item.middleName} , #{item.firstName} , #{item.suffix} , #{item.position} , #{item.birthday} , #{item.email} , #{item.prcentageOfOwnership} , #{item.nationality} , #{item.birthCountry} , #{item.personalType} , #{item.isBusinessManager} , #{item.isAmericanTaxpayer} , #{item.userName} , #{item.password} , #{item.entityName} , #{item.companyPosition} , #{item.personalTypeTwo} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , APPELLATION = #{item.appellation} , LAST_NAME = #{item.lastName} , MIDDLE_NAME = #{item.middleName} , FIRST_NAME = #{item.firstName} , SUFFIX = #{item.suffix} , POSITION = #{item.position} , BIRTHDAY = #{item.birthday} , EMAIL = #{item.email} , PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP = #{item.prcentageOfOwnership} , NATIONALITY = #{item.nationality} , BIRTH_COUNTRY = #{item.birthCountry} , PERSONAL_TYPE = #{item.personalType} , IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER = #{item.isBusinessManager} , IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER = #{item.isAmericanTaxpayer} , USER_NAME = #{item.userName} , PASSWORD = #{item.password} , ENTITY_NAME = #{item.entityName} , COMPANY_POSITION = #{item.companyPosition} , PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO = #{item.personalTypeTwo} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , APPELLATION = #{appellation} , LAST_NAME = #{lastName} , MIDDLE_NAME = #{middleName} , FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} , SUFFIX = #{suffix} , POSITION = #{position} , BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} , EMAIL = #{email} , PRCENTAGE_OF_OWNERSHIP = #{prcentageOfOwnership} , NATIONALITY = #{nationality} , BIRTH_COUNTRY = #{birthCountry} , PERSONAL_TYPE = #{personalType} , IS_BUSINESS_MANAGER = #{isBusinessManager} , IS_AMERICAN_TAXPAYER = #{isAmericanTaxpayer} , USER_NAME = #{userName} , PASSWORD = #{password} , ENTITY_NAME = #{entityName} , COMPANY_POSITION = #{companyPosition} , PERSONAL_TYPE_TWO = #{personalTypeTwo} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_PERSONAL a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
